page.title: 01BLOCK LOCATION
page.content: Our block is situated to the north of PORTSMOUTH and consists of the villages of CLANFIELD and CATHERINGTON and the surrounding farmland.The A3(M) road passes to the east of Clanfield and provides links with Portsmouth, Guildford and London. The area is mainly chalk downs and includes Catherington Down, Blendworth Down and Windmill Hill.Butser Hill and the Queen Elizabeth Country Park are to the north (and outside the block). The Royal Navy shore base, HMS Mercury, is to the north-east and also outside the block.
